评论概述: A little tight in the shoulders.
评论详情: Meh. I can’t tell what the material is but kind of rough for cotton. It’s okay but not fabulous.
After I sewed up the front to a reasonably modest neckline, I just love this dress. The color and the comfortable cotton are beautiful. This was a great find!

评论概述: This looks like a big tent and is see through.
评论详情: I would not buy this again
I love cotton clothes . I wish there were more different colors (I want BRIGHT yellow). Nice summer/beach wear!

评论概述: Love the dress and color! I got the orange color🫶🏻
评论详情: Size xxl is a great fit!
I love this dress, it’s well made and has washed well. Four stars because it’s VERY low cut if you’re short.
This dress is great for a beach coverup bc at least in the lilac color it was somewhat sheer. I have washed several times and it holds up well. Definitely an oversized flowy fit.
I ended up buying in 4 colors because I liked it so much!

This was exactly what I expected/wanted and is just like the picture, but it had a very strong perfume smell and clearly had been worn once (even with tags still on it). So I deducted two stars.  I’m going to keep it anyways. That’s what washing machines are for. I do think Amazon should have a “rent” option for clothes.

I feel like I'm beaching at a tropical location when I wear this dress.  I throw on a tank underneath so the "girls" aren't hanging out where they shouldn't, and off I go.  Breezy and happy.  Shrank a little although I didn't dry.

The fabric is very nice and the color matches the picture! However, the dress is very low cut, like plunges below your bra and the sleeves are a little tight. Because of the cut of the neckline, it doesn’t lay perfectly when pinned either. Overall, not bad for the price, though.
I love these dresses. They are roomy so I would size down. The material is so very comfy and pretty. I bought the black and green and thinking about buying more.
Dress fits true to size, but sleeves are inappropriately sized. Very tight on the arms in an XL. It is as if the sleeves of a S or M were sewn into the XL.

It’s soft and comfortable. I would even say its sexy if I were sexy but at 70 I’m sad to say those days are mostly over. I do love this dress. Just because I’m old it doesn’t mean I have old lady taste. I was a fashion illustrator in NYC back in the day.

This dress is made with a good quality cotton muslin. The color is a perfect match. It is thick enough to be worn as a dress. It feels so soft and light and flows beautifully as you move. The fit is excellent. I bought it in green too I loved it so much. I wear dior pink lilac blush with this and it is beautiful. You just feel pretty in this dress.

评论概述: Love the dress but see through
评论详情: Have the dress in two other colors but returned the white one because it's sheer
This light cotton dress is perfect for the summer. It's flowy and let's air in. True to size and super soft. I'm 5'11 and got a large. Great value!

评论概述: Medium to Light weight gauze dress
评论详情: Medium to Light weight gauze dress … I think the size XLG and fit are perfect on me. I’m 5’7” 180lbs. Even as a beach dress you have to wear with care so it does not rip. It’s not delicate but it is gauze. I did find a long light wt. cotton white slip to wear under it. I wear it to go shopping with ankle strap sandals. I like that it has sleeves to hide my upper arms. Unlike others I think the sleeves are not tight. I bought the brown which looks just like the picture & I wear it with turquoise jewelry. I like that it was Prime and got it in two days. .

评论概述: Very deep v in front, super comfy!
评论详情: I’m very flat chested and the V goes pretty deep on me. It can be made more modest with a bralette no problem! The color and shape are both really flattering. Bought for hot summer days. It is light and flowy. I wish the fabric was a little thicker, I don’t know how much longevity this one has. Fit me really nicely and it is a true maxi length.

Same style as one I loved from Anthropologie, but much better price.  I ordered a medium to begin with, but it very loose and flowy, so I ended up returning for a small. Lightweight and perfect for a cover up or casual summer night.
I have 2 of these dresses bought from Anthropologie and for twice the amount. Not as long as actual dress and a bit different fabric. But for a copy---good dress.
This is a cute coverup for the beach! Too transparent & flowy for regular wear. Didn’t work as a dress for me.

This is the perfect summer beach cover up. Long, super flowy dress that's comfortable and fits great. I'll like it so much I'll wear it with a cami too. I wish it had pockets, but I'm so happy that I can't complain. Great longer arm length. Thrilled to find this dress.

Jusr received this dress.  I ordered an extra large but it’s too big for me so I’ll take it in. A great dress for summer nice emerald green color. Also a great beach coverup.  Don’t hesitate on this one.
This dress is very cute but unfortunately, I received the wrong size. I ordered an XL and received a small. I am very disappointed because it looks like it would be very cute.

I bought this to wear around the house after a shower on a hot day. Perfect for that. Light weight, loose, comfy and cute. Very low cut, but nothing a pin or a few stitches can’t fix! I bought the pink. Wash separately… it bleeds!
Exactly as pictured. It is wide and flowing yet the arms and chest are tighter. I do wish it wasn’t quite as wide but it’s looks nice and is perfect on a hot day.
Bought this little number for putting it over my swimming costume after the beach. Comfortable fit and easy flow.

评论概述: Impossible to wear if >A cup & no fluttery sleeve
评论详情: Perfectly fine dress, a bit transparent in white, but the bust is so tight that anyone >A is unlikely to wear w/o going up 2 sizes. Unlike the picture w/fluttery sleeves, they're just plain white short sleeves. Returned.
